JobTitle: Sr Product Manager, Platform Validation, VMware Marketplace - Opportunity for Working Remotely
JobFullDesc: Ready to build? So are we!Come join VMware Marketplace, part of the new and exciting Modern Applications Business Unit (MAPBU) team, made up of products and services under the Tanzu portfolio to help customers build, run, and manage their most important applications.The VMware Marketplace is an online catalog of software products published by independent software vendors and VMware itself. We allow publishers to package, validate and then publish their solutions in several form factors across multiple target deployment platforms. VMware customers can browse, validate, purchase, and then deploy software products from the VMware Marketplace into their infrastructure.The Marketplace sits at the intersection of business, technology and commerce.One of the key functions of the Marketplace is the capability to help ISV partners validate their products on VMware platforms so we can provide a higher degree of assurance to our customers regarding interoperability and help partners get a suitable badge that demonstrates their commitment to developing products that work with the VMware portfolio (VMware Ready Program, Partner Ready Program).This role is a hands-on position where the product manager is responsible for design, build and operation of a validation process that works across several different VMware platforms and spans across all kinds of products in the ISV ecosystem.Tight feedback loops drive our processes. We value test-driven development, retrospectives, continuous integration, data-informed decision making, and working at a sustainable pace.  We nurture psychological safety within teams and empower them to drive the changes necessary to obtain successful outcomes. We build software and solve problems collaboratively. Teammates are always accessible to lend a helping hand. The marketplace team is distributed around the US, Europe and India.About youYou have seen the power of empowered, balanced teams and believe in Outcomes over Output.  You have strong product instincts, but more importantly have an appreciation for and understanding of data-informed decision making, lean startup, agile and user-centered design values, principles, and practices.  You are excited by the user and business value that technology can unlock. You thrive in a complex ecosystem, collecting, sharing, and synthesizing input from many directions and enabling the teams that you work with to continuously deliver customer value. You believe in doing the right thing and doing what works. #TeamTanzu #VMwareMarketplaceInterested? Here is what we look for:You love working with different kind of software products and are excited by the prospect of validating these products across various platforms, several form factors and deployment methodsYou have experience in packaging software and distributing it in different form factors like containers, helm charts, OVA’s, ISO’s, blueprints, etc.You have prior exposure to automation of testing and validation pipelinesYou enjoy designing workflows that abstract the technical complexities and allow even novice users to build, deploy, run and validate their products on VMware infrastructure platformsYou love working in a hands-on way with customers and internal cross functional teams to demonstrate product capabilities and help drive validation calls with the customersYou want to leverage your firsthand knowledge of interacting with customers to help design improvements to the validation process that makes it simpler and more intuitive with timeYou are a fast learner who is interested in learning and mastering new technology trendsYou are excited about Cloud Native applications and have a strong background in leveraging Kubernetes to help build and manage these applicationsYou are a strong collaborator who actively fosters safe and inclusive teams. You enjoy mentoring others as much as you like learning from themYou work well with others to jointly define and drive product strategy, vision and roadmap while evangelizing to internal stakeholders, partners and users of our productYou enjoy writing user stories and helping the development team prioritize the backlog in order to continuously deliver measurable value towards the vision with your teamYou are excited to innovate and iterate on agile PM processesThe following are attributes we see in successful candidates, but they are not strict requirements.
